name: Dragon blood (itch)
description:
Our first LDJAM game. 

Find your way out of the enemies to win. Find objects hidden and use the potion to get help...  beware the more you drink the worse it would become.

left click to move through the prologue. 

W,A,S,D  - MOVEMENT.

E - POWERUP.

LEFT MOUSE - SWORD ATTACK.

RIGHT MOUSE - CROSS BOW.
